K10D0284_H0286:144a-31: yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-0: yang @144b dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba'i bskul bas skul lo //
K10D0284_H0286:144b-1: ji ltar bdag gi don du bskul ba de bzhin
K10D0284_H0286:144b-2: du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa
K10D0284_H0286:144b-3: thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi
K10D0284_H0286:144b-4: ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag
K10D0284_H0286:144b-5: thams cad kyi ched du'ang skul lo //
K10D0284_H0286:144b-6: gang du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdag mngon par gsol ba /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-7: da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i mu thug yongs su rje bar 'jug pa /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzhi phyal ba'i rjes su 'gro zhing 'jug pa /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-9: steng g-yogs med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongs su rje bar bshad pa /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-10: 'chol ba'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par sgrub pa /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-11: rnam par dbye ba'i mig 'phrul lta bu chos kyi
K10D0284_H0286:144b-12: dbyings su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
K10D0284_H0286:144b-13: thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
K10D0284_H0286:144b-14: kha cig chos kyi 'khor lo dag shin tu bskor
K10D0284_H0286:144b-15: ba / gdul ba dag shin tu btul ba /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-16: zam pa dag shin tu btags pa /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-17: bstan pa dag shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa /
K10D0284_H0286:144b-18: byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu lung bstan pa;
K10D0284_H0286:144b-19: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa

K10D0284_H0286:144b-21: rjes su bstan pa rnams shin tu 'phags pa /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba
K10D0284_H0286:145a-3: bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i gnas rnams zhing de
K10D0284_H0286:145a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams de dang de dag dang /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-6: sems can gyi ris de dang de dag na sems can rab 'byams ma gus par gyur pa /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba'i rgyun bcad pa /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-11: yul la mngon par dga' ba /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-12: 'dus byas kyi sgrib pas zin pa /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-13: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sred pa'i dbang du mchis pa de dang /
K10D0284_H0286:145a-14: de dag la yul thams cad las bdag med par

K10D0284_H0286:145b-0: ston te / lha'i @145b dbang po thams cad du ba dang /
